TopicTitle: cant load the game at all! pls help

Articles.Content:
since a while now i cant quickload or just normal load the game, it just freezes for a fraction of a second and then nothing happens.

im really liquided off because when i do a series of missions that take up hours and i mess up 1 thing the entire time was a waste.

please help and thanks for reading my post (:

Are we related?

Do you mean the quick loading using F9? And loading a saved file does the same? How long are you leaving it to unfreeze or does it crash?

I can't help but notice this is in the modded installs sub forum.

 

Could you kindly list all mods installed?

Most mods are made for older versions of the game (they're made for 1.9 or similar versions since they generally seem to work on 1.11) for backwards compatibility. One of these might have issues with forwards compatibility.

Edited May 22, 2021 by krblman
